Package org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TableDescriptor
    Describes a table.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddColumnSpecification  
    AlterColumnSpecification  
    AlterKeyspaceSpecification
    Builder class to construct a ALTER KEYSPACE specification.
    AlterTableSpecification
    Builder class to construct an ALTER TABLE specification.
    ColumnChangeSpecification  
    ColumnSpecification
    Builder class to help construct CQL statements that involve column manipulation.
    ColumnTypeChangeSpecification  
    CreateIndexSpecification
    Builder class to construct a CREATE INDEX specification.
    CreateKeyspaceSpecification
    Builder class to construct a CREATE KEYSPACE specification.
    CreateTableSpecification
    Builder class to construct a CREATE TABLE specification.
    DefaultTableDescriptor
    Convenient default implementation of TableDescriptor as an extension of TableSpecification that doesn't require the use of generics.
    DropColumnSpecification  
    DropIndexSpecification
    Builder class to construct a DROP INDEX specification.
    DropKeyspaceSpecification
    Builder class to construct a DROP KEYSPACE specification.
    DropTableSpecification
    Builder class that supports the construction of DROP TABLE specifications.
    TableSpecification<T extends WithOptionsSpecification<TableOption,T>>
    Builder class to support the construction of table specifications that have columns.
    UseKeyspaceSpecification
    Builder class to construct a USE KEYSPACE specification.
    WithNameSpecification<T extends WithNameSpecification<T>>
    Abstract builder class to support the construction of named entities specifications.
    WithOptionsSpecification<O extends Option,T extends WithOptionsSpecification<O,T>>
    Abstract options specification based on Map.
